releaseNote.title: Quick Proposal Implementation
notes: Users can now send quick proposals to their customers, along with the ability to upload documents.

releaseNote.title: Support24 Implementation
notes: Users can access TourWiz Module-wise Help, Release Notes, and Support details directly from the TourWiz login.

releaseNote.title: Menu Items Re-arrangement
notes: The menu items have been re-arranged for improved navigation and user experience.

releaseNote.title: Inquiry Creation Navigation
notes: After creating an inquiry, the system will now automatically navigate the user to the list page, enhancing the workflow and reducing manual navigation steps.

releaseNote.title: Report Changes
notes: Calculation of pending and due amounts has been implemented after cancellation, providing more accurate financial information.

releaseNote.title: Website Banner Image Text
notes: The issue causing incorrect display of text in the Website Banner Image when users share a package, itinerary, or proposal has been resolved.
